original_text: King David stood up and he said, ‘Listen to me, my people. I wanted to build a house where we could put the Lord's Covenant Box. It would be like a place for our God to rest his feet. I prepared the things that I would need to build a temple.
korean_text: 이에 다윗 왕이 일어서서 이르되 나의 형제들, 나의 백성들아 내 말을 들으라 나는 여호와의 언약궤 곧 우리 하나님의 발판을 봉안할 성전을 건축할 마음이 있어서 건축할 재료를 준비하였으나

sentences.original_text: I wanted to build a house
where we could put the Lord's Covenant Box
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 주의 언약 궤를 둘 수 있는

sentences.original_text: It would be like a place
for our God to rest his feet
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 하나님이 발을 쉴 수 있는

sentences.original_text: that I would need to build a temple
